member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:TreatTracker.WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: So you got a job with Wonka Enterprise huh? Finally out of the terrible jungle of LoompaLand? Well here we go! Register here after orientation.

member.summary: Candy invention, my dear friends, is 93% perspiration, 6% electricity, 4% evaporation, and 2% butter scotch ripple.

member.summary: View all Candies created in Wonka Candy Enterprise.

member.summary: Create a new candy entry for your factory after inventory was counted. Remember to enter in golden ticket entries seperately.
member.param: Make sure to enter in all the required details when creating a candy entry. Your Factory Id, username, and today's date will be automatically added to the entry.

member.param: Make sure to enter in all the required details when editing a candy entry. Your username and today's date will automatically be added to the modification.
